mapper.insert: insert into member(userid, password, name, age, email, is_admin, regdate) values( #{userid},#{password},#{name},#{age},#{email},0,sysdate )
mapper.select: select m.userid as userid, m.name as name, m.age as age, m.password as password, m.email as email, m.is_admin as isAdmin, to_char(m.regdate,'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') as regdate, m.profile as profile from member m where ${searchKey} = #{searchVal}

select t2.* from (select rownum as seq,t.* from ( select m.userid as userid, m.name as name, m.age as age, m.password as password, m.email as email, m.is_admin as isAdmin, to_char(m.regdate,'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') as regdate
from Member m where ${searchKey} like '%' || #{searchVal} || '%' order by regdate desc ) t)t2 where t2.seq between #{start} and #{end} order by t2.seq asc

select t2.* from (select rownum as seq,t.* from ( select m.userid as userid, m.name as name, m.age as age, m.password as password, m.email as email, m.is_admin as isAdmin, to_char(m.regdate,'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') as regdate
from Member m order by regdate desc ) t)t2 where t2.seq between #{start} and #{end} order by t2.seq asc
